item.title: About
item.description: Based in Lausanne üá®üá≠, I work at QoQa, a company fueled by fun and craziness. As a Test Manager, my role is to ensure that websites and applications function as they should. With 7 years of experience in the QA field, I am known for being open, a bit crazy, and efficient in my work. I am a trained IT management technician who has turned my passion into my profession: I do what I love and love what I do.

item.title: My Sixth Participation in the Gentleman's Ride: An Experience
item.description: Every year, the Gentleman’s Ride holds a special place in my heart and my life. This year marks my sixth participation in this iconic event, and I’m more excited than ever to share what it represents to me, the causes it fights for, and why it’s so special. The Gentleman’s Ride is more than just a motorcycle ride. It’s a global initiative aimed at raising awareness and funds for prostate cancer research and men’s mental health.

item.title: Why I ditched Google Chrome, And why you should too.
item.description: Embracing a New Chapter: My Transition from Chrome to Arc Browser At the end of 2022, while reading about self-driving cars, my phone rang. It was a buddy excited about manned missions to Mars. As I glanced at my Mac and opened Chrome to learn more, I realized: everything around us is evolving rapidly, except our web browsers. They‚Äôve remained almost the same for ages. That was the moment I decided to change.
